TopicTitle: How do you return an experiment from a lab?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I have a contract to "Do an experiment on your Station around Duna then return the experiment to Kerbin". But there seems to be no way to take the experiment as you can usually do when you EVA (right click --> take data/experiment), even when the research is finished (data dropped to 0).

Does anybody know how to do this?
Station != lab. They simply ask you to crack open a can of goo or do any other experiment and return the result.
The closest contract I've heard of is from Station Science mod. But first you need to confirm if this is mod contract or stock contract. Pasting a screenshot of contract description suffices.

20 minutes ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Station != lab. They simply ask you to crack open a can of goo or do any other experiment and return the result.

Oh man, you're right! Returning a simple Crew Report did the trick. I assumed it had something to do with the lab since the station has a lab

Thanks for the help!
